statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name FROM inventory WHERE critical_threshold < 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity >= critical_threshold ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < critical_threshold;
SELECT item_name FROM inventory WHERE item_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM inventory WHERE critical_threshold > 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity, critical_threshold FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 OR critical_threshold < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC, critical_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM critical_inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM critical_inventory_items WHERE item_quantity > 10;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM critical_inventory_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM notification_triggers WHERE trigger_status = TRUE;
SELECT item_id, notification_type FROM notification_triggers WHERE trigger_status = FALSE ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM critical_inventory_items WHERE item_quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM critical_inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_quantity FROM critical_inventory_items WHERE item_quantity < 5 ORDER BY item_quantity ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_quantity FROM critical_inventory_items WHERE item_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT ci.item_name, nt.notification_type FROM critical_inventory_items ci JOIN notification_triggers nt ON ci.item_id = nt.item_id WHERE nt.trigger_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM critical_items;
SELECT item_name, current_inventory FROM critical_items WHERE current_inventory < critical_inventory_level;
SELECT notification_id, message, notification_timestamp FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, trigger_name, log_message FROM trigger_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, current_inventory FROM critical_items WHERE current_inventory > 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM critical_items WHERE current_inventory < critical_inventory_level ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, current_inventory FROM critical_items WHERE critical_inventory_level > 10 ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT item_name, current_inventory, critical_inventory_level FROM critical_items WHERE current_inventory < 5 OR critical_inventory_level < 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM trigger_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp;
SELECT notification_id, message, notification_timestamp FROM notifications WHERE notification_timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM critical_items;
SELECT item_name, inventory_level FROM critical_items;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT notification_type, notification_message FROM notifications;
SELECT user_id, notification_id, is_read FROM user_notifications;
SELECT * FROM critical_items WHERE inventory_level > 10 ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT item_name, inventory_level FROM critical_items WHERE item_id = 3;

SELECT users.username, notifications.notification_message FROM users JOIN user_notifications ON users.user_id = user_notifications.user_id JOIN notifications ON user_notifications.notification_id = notifications.notification_id WHERE users.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'urgent' AND notification_message LIKE '%attention%';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_id IN (SELECT notification_id FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = 2);
SELECT * FROM critical_items;
SELECT item_name, inventory_level FROM critical_items WHERE inventory_level > 50;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_type FROM triggers ORDER BY trigger_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, inventory_level FROM critical_items WHERE inventory_level < 10;
SELECT notifications.message, users.username FROM notifications JOIN users ON notifications.item_id = users.user_id;
SELECT trigger_name, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM triggers LEFT JOIN logs ON triggers.trigger_id = logs.trigger_id GROUP BY trigger_name HAVING log_count > 0;
